name: pagesblanches
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool les_pagesjaunes_les_pagesblanche_france.
Tool description: Extraire les données du Pages Jaunes et Pages Blanches scraping email et téléphone 
API description: This function retrieves data from the Pages Blanches API for extracting email and phone information based on the given parameters.

pbpage.description: The page number of the search results to retrieve.

pbkeyword.description: The search keyword or term for the Pages Blanches query.

pblocation.description: The location to filter the search results.
